plot outline: Banesh Fene, a charming, witty and extremely sharp guy with daring nature and an uncanny knack for investigation who comes to Pune for a medical exam, witnesses a shocking incident. He suspects foul play and with the help of his friends Aajoba, Aboli, and Bhubhu, Banesh decides to investigate more about the incident. Soon, he realizes that he has walked himself into trouble as he has to face off against Appa, a cruel criminal.
title: Faster Fene
plot: Banesh Fene, a charming, witty and extremely sharp guy with daring nature and an uncanny knack for investigation who comes to Pune for a medical exam, witnesses a shocking incident. He suspects foul play and with the help of his friends Aajoba, Aboli, and Bhubhu, Banesh decides to investigate more about the incident. Soon, he realizes that he has walked himself into trouble as he has to face off against Appa, a cruel criminal.

Evolved from a series of Old Children's Books and novels by Renowned Marathi writer Late. B.R. Bhagwat; _Faster Fene_ (qv) is the tale of a tech savvy and adventurous teenager named Banesh Fene who likes birding as well as solving mysteries and crimes he sees around him. While appearing for a medical entrance exam, he is witness to something that shakes him from within, and thus begins the thrilling and nail-biting journey to bring down the evils that plague one of most the important sectors of a society.::Nikhilc
